item.title: Report X-2023020748
item.description:
Report X-2023020748

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-03T15:59:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-02-14
  • City: RAPID CITY
  • State: SD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: spilldevgrp@fedex.com
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Package was found during normal sort operations at our station location in Rapid city South Dakota. When offered to the clean up specialist, the package was found to consist of a fibreboard box there was brown paper on the bottom of the box and a plastic gallon jug inside. the commodity was Kiwo On Press Cleaner. When the employee viewed the label he became aware of a Flammable GHS label and obtained an SDS which states the flash point of the product is 40Â°c. and should be classified as UN 1263 packing group III. There were no marks nor labels on the package which indicated there was flammable liquid inside. Package was placed in a plastic moisture barrier and contained in a steel salvage package and is being held for FAA investigation.
